TELEMAC-MASCARET
================

# Available modules


The overview below shows which TELEMAC-MASCARET installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using TELEMAC-MASCARET, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load TELEMAC-MASCARET/8p3r1-foss-2021b
```
